channel.title: Coils – Cloud Chemistry
channel.description: Premium eLiquid Custom Handmade to Order™

item.title: TFV16 Lite Coil
item.dc:creator: Matteo Laki
item.description: Shop SMOKs brand new coil system for the TFV16 LITE Tank!
item.content:encoded:
Shop SMOKs brand new coil system for the TFV16 Lite Tank! Conical Mesh and Dual Mesh designs better suit your vaping needs by projecting warm throat hits, massive unmatched flavor and high quality performance in each coil. The Lite coils offer a unique structure in each coil to better optimize e-Liquid flavors and performance all around. The airflow inlets condense vapor as it flows through the coil to the drip tip, creating an unparalleled burst of pure flavor! Each mesh coil consists of multiple structurally stable hexagonal designs that enables the mesh wire to heat evenly and spread properly saving you from burning your coils!

Coil Details:

  • Powerful & Warm Throat Hit
  • Fast Heating Rate
  • Massive Vapor & Amazing Flavor
  • 0.2ohm Conical Mesh Coil – rated for 60-85W
  • 0.15ohm Dual Mesh Coil – rated for 60-90W
  • Plug ‘n’ Play Coil Installation

Package Contents:

  • 1x SMOK TFV16 Lite Replacement Coil

item.content:encoded:

item.title: Eleaf iCare Coils
item.dc:creator: James
item.description: Compatible with iCare, iCare Mini PCC, iCare Solo & iCare 2 Kits
item.content:encoded:
The Eleaf iCare IC Replacement Coils are 100% authentic in brand and quality! There’s nothing artificial about these coils, precisely made for the iCare and Mini PCC Kits. The exclusivity of these coils is the mouth-to-lung design which aids in providing gratifying flavor and vapor production at 1.1 ohms. The Eleaf iCare IC coils are capable of outputting a maximum of 15W and will provide longevity for your vaping needs. The Eleaf iCare IC Replacement Coils are easy to install and are ideal for the experienced and inexperienced alike.

Coil Features:

  • Available Resistance: 1.1 Ohms
  • Wattage Range: 5W – 15W
  • Wicking Material: Organic Cotton
  • Wire Material: Kanthal Resistance
  • For Use with: Eleaf iCare
  • Made with Organic Cotton Wicks
  • Manufactures Great Vapor Production
  • Delivers Rich and Flavorful Hits
  • Compact Stature
  • Great for Mouth-to-Lung Hits
  • 100% Authentic Eleaf

Package Contents:

  • 1x Eleaf iCare IC Replacement Coil

Compatible with iCare, iCare Mini PCC, iCare Solo & iCare 2 Kits

item.title: Sense Herakles Coils
item.dc:creator: James
item.content:encoded:
Sense brings us the Herakles replacement coils that are compatible with the Herakles Sub-Ohm Tank, the Atlantis tank and MANY MORE!

COILS:

  • 0.2ohm Coil
    • Recommended: 30-75W

Compatible with Herakles, Herakles Honor, SuperTank, SuperTank Mini, Atlantis, Melo, Triton, Starre Pro, Maganus, X-Tank, Morpheus & Morpheus 2.

item.content:encoded:
***THESE COILS ARE FOR THE SMOKTECH OSUB MINI KIT***

Helmet Nano CLP 0.4 Ohm

  • Fused Clapton Dual Core
  • Lower Wattage & More Vapor
  • 0.4 Ohm (20-45W)

item.title: Tobeco Super Tank Coils
item.dc:creator: James
item.content:encoded:
The Tobeco Super Tank Replacement Coils are the real deal– no clones here! The exclusivity behind these coils are that they excel in dispensing precise flavors and massive vapor production. Not to be outdone, they feature a vertical coil orientation which is enclosed by extremely absorbent wicking material. Each replacement coil is made with 100% pure organic cotton and is extremely easy-to-wick.

For maximum experience, pair the Tobeco Super Tank Replacement Coils with the Super Tank Mini and the 25mm Super Tank with one of your favorite Cloud Chemsitry e-Liquids.

Coil Details:

  • Available in 0.2 and 0.5 ohms
  • 0.2 ohm (40-100w)
  • 0.5 ohm (30-100w)
  • 0.2 ohm (Mesh)
  • Vertical Kanthal Coil build
  • 100% Pure Organic Cotton
  • Large wicking holes for maximum absorption
  • Compatibility: Super Tank Mini and 25mm Super Tank Mini 

Package Contents:

  • 1x Tobeco Super Tank Replacement Coil

Compatible with SuperTank, SuperTank Mini, Herakles, Herakles Honor, Atlantis, Melo, Triton, Starre, Maganus, X-Tank, Morpheus & Morpheus 2 Tanks
